    java.io.Serializable

    public class ProcessorBehaviour
extends jade.core.behaviours.FSMBehaviour
    Behaviour of the Processor agents.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ProcessorBehaviour.ActiveWaiting
      ProcessorBehaviour state in which the Processor agent is actively waiting to access a file to treat.
      private class  ProcessorBehaviour.PassiveWaiting
      ProcessorBehaviour state in which the Processor agent is waiting for message from the TweetCrawler agent.
      private class  ProcessorBehaviour.ReadingFile
      ProcessorBehaviour state in which the Processor agent is reading and treating a line of a file.
      private class  ProcessorBehaviour.Request
      ProcessorBehaviour state in which the Processor agent is requesting the access to a file to treat.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessorBehaviour

        public ProcessorBehaviour(jade.core.Agent agent,
                          com.tweetcrawl.agents.utils.TweetCrawlerLogger logger,
                          jade.content.lang.Codec codec,
                          jade.content.onto.Ontology quoteOntology,
                          jade.content.onto.Ontology quoteActionOntology)
        Constructor of the behaviour.
        Parameters:
        agent - the Processor agent using the behaviour
        logger - the TweetCrawlerLogger used to display errors encountered
        codec - the Codec used to communicate with the QuoteGraphGenerator and unknown agents
        quoteOntology - the Ontology used to send Quote messages to the QuoteGraphGenerator agent
        quoteActionOntology - the Ontology used to send QuotesAction messages to the QuoteGraphGenerator agent

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessageActionGraph

        private void sendMessageActionGraph(java.lang.String action)
        Allows to send a QuotesAction message to the QuoteGraphGenerator indicating that the Processor agent is either starting or ending its work on a term.
        Parameters:
        action - the action of the Processor agent
